#| label: kmfunc
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false

coxvars <- modvars
coxvars[modvars %in% stratavars] <- paste0("strata(", coxvars[modvars %in% stratavars], ")")

kmfunc <- function(data = sdata, time, event, eventname, novar = NULL,
                   labposadj = c(0.18, -0.1), textadjy = 0.97, textadjx = 0, smally = c(0, 0.01, 0.02)) {
  levs <- levels(data %>% pull(case))
  nlevs <- length(levs)

  # cox results
  mod <- summary(coxph(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "== 'Yes') ~ case + frailty(lopnrcase)")),
    data = data
  ))

  cox_crude <- c(
    "Crude HR (95% CI)",
    "reference",
    paste0(
      fn(mod$conf.int[1, "exp(coef)"], dig = 2),
      " (", fn(mod$conf.int[1, "lower .95"], dig = 2),
      "-", fn(mod$conf.int[1, "upper .95"], dig = 2), ")"
    )
  )

  coxvars2 <- setdiff(coxvars, novar)
  mod <- summary(coxph(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "== 'Yes') ~ case +", paste(coxvars2, collapse = " + "), "+ frailty(lopnrcase)")),
    data = data
  ))

  cox_adj <- c(
    "Adj HR (95% CI)",
    "reference",
    paste0(
      fn(mod$conf.int[1, "exp(coef)"], dig = 2),
      " (", fn(mod$conf.int[1, "lower .95"], dig = 2),
      "-", fn(mod$conf.int[1, "upper .95"], dig = 2), ")"
    )
  )

  fit <- survfit(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "== 'Yes') ~ case")),
    data = data
  )

  fuyears <- 12
  s <- summary(fit, times = seq(0, fuyears * 365, 1), extend = T)

  plot_data <- tibble(
    "time" = s$time,
    "n.risk" = s$n.risk,
    "n.event" = s$n.event,
    "n.censor" = s$n.censor,
    "estimate" = 1 - s$surv,
    "strata" = s$strata
  ) %>%
    mutate(
      strata = fct_rev(fct_inorder(str_remove_all(strata, "case="))),
    )
  ylim <- c(0, 1)
  ylab <- paste0(eventname, " (%)")

  p <- ggplot(plot_data, aes(x = time / 365, y = estimate, color = strata)) +
    geom_step(aes(linetype = strata), linewidth = 1) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c(global_cols[1:2])) +
    # scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, endfollow, 1), limits = c(0, endfollow), expand = c(0, 0)) +
    # scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_percent(suffix = ""), limits = c(0, 1), expand = c(0, 0)) +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, fuyears, 2), limits = c(0, fuyears)) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_percent(suffix = ""), limits = ylim) +
    theme_classic() +
    theme(
      text = element_text(size = 20, face = "bold"),
      legend.position = "none",
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black")
    ) +
    labs(x = "Follow-up (years)", y = ylab) +
    annotate("text",
      x = textadjx, y = c(textadjy, textadjy - 0.1, textadjy - 0.2), label = c("", levs),
      hjust = 0, size = 6, fontface = "bold", colour = c("black", global_cols[2:1])
    ) +
    annotate("text",
      x = textadjx + 3.7, y = c(textadjy, textadjy - 0.1, textadjy - 0.2), label = cox_crude,
      hjust = 0.5, size = 6, fontface = "bold", colour = c("black", global_cols[2:1])
    ) +
    annotate("text",
      x = textadjx + 7, y = c(textadjy, textadjy - 0.1, textadjy - 0.2), label = cox_adj,
      hjust = 0.5, size = 6, fontface = "bold", colour = c("black", global_cols[2:1])
    )

  p25 <- ggplot(plot_data, aes(x = time / 30.5, y = estimate, color = strata)) +
    geom_step(aes(linetype = strata), linewidth = 1) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c(global_cols[1:2])) +
    # scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, endfollow, 1), limits = c(0, endfollow), expand = c(0, 0)) +
    # scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_percent(suffix = ""), limits = c(0, 1), expand = c(0, 0)) +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 12, 2), limits = c(0, 12)) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_percent(suffix = ""), breaks = smally, limits = c(min(smally), max(smally))) +
    theme_classic() +
    theme(
      text = element_text(size = 20 * 0.7, face = "bold"),
      legend.position = "none",
      axis.title.y = element_blank()
    ) +
    labs(x = "Follow-up (months)", y = ylab)

  p <- p + inset_element(p25, left = 0.01, bottom = 0.3, right = 0.4, top = 0.6)

  # n at risk
  table_data <- plot_data %>%
    filter(
      time %in% c(seq(0, fuyears, 2) * 365)
    )

  t <- ggplot(table_data, aes(y = strata, x = time / 365)) +
    geom_text(aes(label = n.risk), size = 6, fontface = "bold", colour = rep(global_cols[2:1], each = 7)) +
    # scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, endfollow, 1), limits = c(0, endfollow), expand = c(0, 0)) +
    # scale_y_discrete(expand = c(0, 0)) +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, fuyears, 2), limits = c(0, fuyears)) +
    coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, fuyears), clip = "off") +
    labs(
      subtitle = "No. at risk"
    ) +
    theme(
      text = element_text(size = 20, face = "bold"),
      plot.caption = element_text(size = 20, face = "bold"),
      panel.background = element_blank(),
      axis.text.x = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks = element_blank(),
      axis.title = element_blank(),
      # plot.margin = unit(c(0, 1, 0, 3), "cm"), # trouble
      # axis.text.y = element_blank()
      # axis.text.y = element_text(margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 100))
      axis.text.y = element_text(hjust = 0, colour = global_cols[1:2], face = "bold")
    )

  km <- (p / t) + plot_layout(height = c(1, .25))
  create_pptx(km)
  km
}
